reviewText: I wish I knew it was in German and wouldnt play on my DVD player .. do not buy if you live in America .. now I have to try to get my money back ....

dear american cousins.. please don't bother with this double pack..both movies are heavily censored by the BBFC and both are region coded B for european playback..really can't see why these are on U.S Amazon the U.S versions are better...

Buyer be ware.
This video is region 2. It's not compatible with North American bluray players.  Very disappointed that is was not disclosed more transparently.  Hope others learn from my mistake
